item.title: ⌘ macOS Color Pickers
item.author: chanunnaki@gmail.com (Chanunnaki)
item.description: In nature, light creates the color. In the picture, color creates the light. -Hans Hoffman Colors… they’re everywhere and all around us, and don’t you just love them? When designing anything, colors are super important. The color of your fonts and UI elements can give your creations unique personality, character and drive attention towards different aspects of your design. Colors also give designers the ability to subtly draw a users’ focus to a desired element.
